title: Wilco Tickets: CapitalCityTickets.com is Slashing Their Prices on Wilco Tickets for their 2016 Tour Dates for Cities like Pittsburgh, New Haven, Atlanta, and Brooklyn
text:
Wilco concert tickets for their 2016 tour dates are on sale now for cities like Pittsburgh, New Haven, Atlanta, and Brooklyn. Trusted secondary ticket market provider CapitalCityTickets.com is providing Wilco fans with a promo code CITY5 to save an additional 5% on all orders.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a wide selection of Wilco tickets at affordable prices. Wilco are hitting the road in 2016 and kicking it all off on January 25th in Pittsburgh, PA.
The band is out in support of their new album, Star Wars.
William Tyler will support Jauary 25-31, Bill Frisell on February 5th, Steve Gunn on February 6-7, and Girlpool on February 9-13.
CLICK HERE to browse all levels of seating for Wilco concerts at CapitalCityTickets.com.
There isn't an event you will see this year that has the same exciting atmosphere as a live Wilco concert.
CapitalCityTickets.com already offers slashed ticket prices on all their ticket inventory. You can save an additional percentage off by using promo code provided.
Follow on Social Media for Special Deals and Discounts
